title: [The Singer and the dancer : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production The Singer and the Dancer (1976), including 9 B&W Stills (Large). Director Gillian Armstrong, Starring Ruth Cracknell, Elizabeth Crosby, Russell Kiefel.
